cnd19:2.1: Dvaham sakkam apucchissanti so brahmano dvikkhattum buddham bhagavantam panham apucchi.
cnd19:2.2: Tassa bhagava panham puttho na byakasi—
cnd19:2.6: Atha va addho mahaddhano dhanavatipi sakko.
cnd19:2.8: saddhadhanam siladhanam hiridhanam ottappadhanam sutadhanam cagadhanam pannadhanam satipatthanadhanam sammappadhanadhanam iddhipadadhanam indriyadhanam baladhanam bojjhangadhanam maggadhanam phaladhanam nibbanadhanam.
cnd19:2.9: Imehi anekavidhehi dhanaratanehi addho mahaddhano dhanavatipi sakko.
cnd19:2.10: Atha va sakko pahu visavi alamatto suro viro vikkanto abhiru acchambhi anutrasi apalayi pahinabhayabheravo vigatalomahamsotipi sakko.
cnd19:2.11: Dvaham sakkam apucchissanti dvaham sakkam apucchissam ayacissam ajjhesissam pasadayissanti—
cnd19:4.2: Na me byakasiti na me byakasi na acikkhi na desesi na pannapesi na patthapesi na vivari na vibhaji na uttaniakasi na pakasesi.
cnd19:4.4: mamsacakkhunapi cakkhuma, dibbacakkhunapi cakkhuma, pannacakkhunapi cakkhuma, buddhacakkhunapi cakkhuma, samantacakkhunapi cakkhuma.
cnd19:5.3: nilo ca vanno, pitako ca vanno, lohitako ca vanno, kanho ca vanno, odato ca vanno (…).
cnd19:5.4: Yattha ca akkhilomani patitthitani tam nilam hoti sunilam pasadikam dassaneyyam umapupphasamanam.
cnd19:5.5: Tassa parato pitakam hoti supitakam suvannavannam pasadikam dassaneyyam kanikarapupphasamanam.
cnd19:5.6: Ubhato ca akkhikutani bhagavato lohitakani honti sulohitakani pasadikani dassaneyyani indagopakasamanani.
cnd19:5.7: Majjhe kanham hoti sukanham alukham siniddham pasadikam dassaneyyam addaritthakasamanam.
cnd19:5.8: Tassa parato odatam hoti suodatam setam pandaram pasadikam dassaneyyam osadhitarakasamanam.
cnd19:5.9: Tena bhagava pakatikena mamsacakkhuna attabhavapariyapannena purimasucaritakammabhinibbattena samanta yojanam passati diva ceva rattinca.
cnd19:5.10: Yada hi caturangasamannagato andhakaro hoti suriyo ca atthangato hoti;
cnd19:5.11: kalapakkho ca uposatho hoti, tibbo ca vanasando hoti, maha ca kalamegho abbhutthito hoti.
cnd19:5.12: Evarupe caturangasamannagate andhakare samanta yojanam passati.
cnd19:5.13: Natthi so kutto va kavatam va pakaro va pabbato va gaccho va lata va avaranam rupanam dassanaya.
cnd19:5.14: Ekance tilaphalam nimittam katva tilavahe pakkhipeyya, tamyeva tilaphalam uddhareyya.
cnd19:6.2: Bhagava dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena satte passati cavamane upapajjamane hine panite suvanne dubbanne;
cnd19:6.4: “ime vata bhonto satta kayaduccaritena samannagata vaciduccaritena samannagata manoduccaritena samannagata ariyanam upavadaka micchaditthika micchaditthikammasamadana, te kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapanna;
cnd19:6.5: ime va pana bhonto satta kayasucaritena samannagata vacisucaritena samannagata manosucaritena samannagata ariyanam anupavadaka sammaditthika sammaditthikammasamadana, te kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanna”ti.
cnd19:6.6: Iti dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena satte passati cavamane upapajjamane hine panite suvanne dubbanne sugate duggate, yathakammupage satte pajanati.
cnd19:6.7: Akankhamano ca bhagava ekampi lokadhatum passeyya, dvepi lokadhatuyo passeyya, tissopi lokadhatuyo passeyya, catassopi lokadhatuyo passeyya, pancapi lokadhatuyo passeyya, dasapi lokadhatuyo passeyya, visampi lokadhatuyo passeyya, timsampi lokadhatuyo passeyya, cattalisampi lokadhatuyo passeyya, pannasampi lokadhatuyo passeyya, satampi lokadhatuyo passeyya, sahassimpi culanikam lokadhatum passeyya, dvisahassimpi majjhimikam lokadhatum passeyya, tisahassimpi lokadhatum passeyya, mahasahassimpi lokadhatum passeyya, yavatakam va pana akankheyya tavatakam passeyya.
cnd19:7.2: Bhagava mahapanno puthupanno javanapanno hasapanno tikkhapanno nibbedhikapanno pannapabhedakusalo pabhinnanano adhigatapatisambhido catuvesarajjappatto dasabaladhari purisasabho purisasiho purisanago purisajanno purisadhorayho anantanano anantatejo anantayaso addho mahaddhano dhanava neta vineta anuneta pannapeta nijjhapeta pekkheta pasadeta.
cnd19:7.3: So hi bhagava anuppannassa maggassa uppadeta asanjatassa maggassa sanjaneta anakkhatassa maggassa akkhata, maggannu maggavidu maggakovido magganuga ca pana etarahi savaka viharanti paccha samannagata.
cnd19:8.1: So hi bhagava janam janati, passam passati, cakkhubhuto nanabhuto dhammabhuto brahmabhuto vatta pavatta atthassa ninneta amatassa data dhammassami tathagato.
cnd19:8.2: Natthi tassa bhagavato annatam adittham aviditam asacchikatam aphassitam pannaya.
cnd19:8.3: Atitam anagatam paccuppannam upadaya sabbe dhamma sabbakarena buddhassa bhagavato nanamukhe apatham agacchanti.
cnd19:8.4: Yam kinci neyyam nama atthi janitabbam attattho va parattho va ubhayattho va ditthadhammiko va attho samparayiko va attho uttano va attho gambhiro va attho gulho va attho paticchanno va attho neyyo va attho nito va attho anavajjo va attho nikkileso va attho vodano va attho paramattho va attho, sabbam tam anto buddhanane parivattati.
cnd19:9.1: Sabbam kayakammam buddhassa bhagavato nananuparivatti, sabbam vacikammam nananuparivatti, sabbam manokammam nananuparivatti.
cnd19:9.2: Atite buddhassa bhagavato appatihatam nanam, anagate appatihatam nanam, paccuppanne appatihatam nanam, yavatakam neyyam tavatakam nanam, yavatakam nanam tavatakam neyyam.
cnd19:9.3: Neyyapariyantikam nanam, nanapariyantikam neyyam, neyyam atikkamitva nanam nappavattati, nanam atikkamitva neyyapatho natthi.
cnd19:9.5: Yatha dvinnam samuggapatalanam sammaphusitanam hetthimam samuggapatalam uparimam nativattati, uparimam samuggapatalam hetthimam nativattati, annamannapariyantatthayino;
cnd19:9.6: evameva buddhassa bhagavato neyyanca nananca annamannapariyantatthayino.
cnd19:9.7: Yavatakam neyyam tavatakam nanam, yavatakam nanam tavatakam neyyam, neyyapariyantikam nanam, nanapariyantikam neyyam.
cnd19:9.8: Neyyam atikkamitva nanam nappavattati, nanam atikkamitva neyyapatho natthi.
cnd19:10.2: Sabbe dhamma buddhassa bhagavato avajjanapatibaddha akankhapatibaddha manasikarapatibaddha cittuppadapatibaddha.
cnd19:10.4: Sabbesanca sattanam bhagava asayam janati, anusayam janati, caritam janati, adhimuttim janati, apparajakkhe maharajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svakare dvakare suvinnapaye duvinnapaye bhabbabhabbe satte janati.
cnd19:10.5: Sadevako loko samarako sabrahmako sassamanabrahmani paja sadevamanussa antobuddhanane parivattati.
cnd19:11.1: Yatha ye keci macchakacchapa antamaso timitimingalam upadaya antomahasamudde parivattanti, evameva sadevako loko samarako loko sabrahmako loko sassamanabrahmani paja sadevamanussa antobuddhanane parivattati.
cnd19:12.1: Yatha ye keci pakkhi antamaso garulam venateyyam upadaya akasassa padese parivattanti, evameva yepi te sariputtasama pannaya samannagata tepi buddhananassa padese parivattanti;
cnd19:12.2: buddhananam devamanussanam pannam pharitva abhibhavitva titthati.
cnd19:13.1: Yepi te khattiyapandita brahmanapandita gahapatipandita samanapandita nipuna kataparappavada valavedhirupa vobhindanta manne caranti pannagatena ditthigatani, te panhe abhisankharitva abhisankharitva tathagatam upasankamitva pucchanti gulhani ca paticchannani.
cnd19:13.2: Kathita visajjita ca te panha bhagavata honti nidditthakarana.
cnd19:14.2: Bhagava buddhacakkhuna lokam volokento addasa satte apparajakkhe maharajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svakare dvakare suvinnapaye duvinnapaye appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassavino viharante.
cnd19:14.3: Seyyathapi nama uppaliniyam va paduminiyam va pundarikiniyam va appekaccani uppalani va padumani va pundarikani va udake jatani udake samvaddhani udakanuggatani antonimuggaposini, appekaccani uppalani va padumani va pundarikani va udake jatani udake samvaddhani samodakam thitani, appekaccani uppalani va padumani va pundarikani va udake jatani udake samvaddhani udaka accuggamma titthanti anupalittani udakena;
cnd19:14.4: evamevam bhagava buddhacakkhuna lokam volokento addasa satte apparajakkhe maharajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svakare dvakare suvinnapaye duvinnapaye appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassavino viharante.
cnd19:14.6: “ayam puggalo ragacarito, ayam dosacarito, ayam mohacarito, ayam vitakkacarito, ayam saddhacarito, ayam nanacarito”ti.
cnd19:14.9: mohacaritassa bhagava puggalassa uddese paripucchaya kalena dhammassavane kalena dhammasakacchaya garusamvase niveseti;
cnd19:14.11: saddhacaritassa bhagava puggalassa pasadaniyam nimittam acikkhati buddhasubodhim dhammasudhammatam sanghasuppatipattim silani ca;
cnd19:14.12: attano nanacaritassa bhagava puggalassa vipassananimittam acikkhati aniccakaram dukkhakaram anattakaram.
cnd19:17.3: Bhagava sabbannutananena upeto samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samupapanno samannagato.
cnd19:20.1: Yavatatiyanca devisi, byakarotiti me sutanti yavatatiyam buddho sahadhammikam panham puttho byakaroti no samsaretiti—
cnd19:20.2: evam maya uggahitam, evam maya upadharitam, evam maya upalakkhitam.
cnd19:20.5: Yatha raja pabbajita vuccanti rajisayo, brahmana pabbajita vuccanti brahmanisayo, evameva bhagava ceva isi cati—
cnd19:21.2: Mahantam silakkhandham esi gavesi pariyesitipi isi.
cnd19:21.6: mahantam vimuttinanadassanakkhandham esi gavesi pariyesitipi isi.
cnd19:21.7: Mahato tamokayassa padalanam esi gavesi pariyesitipi isi.
cnd19:21.8: Mahato vipallasassa pabhedanam esi gavesi pariyesitipi isi.
cnd19:21.18: mahato dhammadhajassa ussapanam esi gavesi pariyesitipi isi.
cnd19:21.25: mahantam paramattham amatam nibbanam esi gavesi pariyesitipi isi.
cnd19:21.26: Mahesakkhehi va sattehi esito gavesito pariyesito—
cnd19:21.27: “kaham buddho, kaham bhagava, kaham devadevo, kaham narasabho”tipi isiti—
cnd19:24.3: Paro lokoti manussalokam thapetva sabbo paro lokoti—
cnd19:25.1: Brahmaloko sadevakoti sadevako loko samarako sabrahmako sassamanabrahmani paja sadevamanussati—
cnd19:26.1: Ditthim te nabhijanatiti tuyham ditthim khantim rucim laddhim ajjhasayam adhippayam loko na janati—
cnd19:26.2: “ayam evamditthiko evankhantiko evamruciko evamladdhiko evamajjhasayo evamadhippayo”ti na janati na passati na dakkhati nadhigacchati na vindati na patilabhatiti—
cnd19:27.2: Atha va bhagava sakkato garukato manito pujito apacito labhi civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanantipi yasassiti—
cnd19:30.1: Evam abhikkantadassavinti evam abhikkantadassavim aggadassavim setthadassavim visetthadassavim pamokkhadassavim uttamadassavim paramadassavinti—
cnd19:31.2: vahassetam bharanti, evampi atthi panhena agamam.
cnd19:32.1: Katham lokam avekkhantanti katham lokam avekkhantam paccavekkhantam tulayantam tirayantam vibhavayantam vibhutam karontanti—
cnd19:33.1: Maccuraja na passatiti maccuraja na passati na dakkhati nadhigacchati na vindati na patilabhatiti—
cnd19:36.2: Lokoti nirayaloko tiracchanaloko pettivisayaloko manussaloko devaloko khandhaloko dhatuloko ayatanaloko ayam loko paro loko brahmaloko sadevako.
cnd19:36.5: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, lokoti vuccati”ti?
cnd19:36.8: Cakkhu kho bhikkhu lujjati, rupa lujjanti, cakkhuvinnanam lujjati, cakkhusamphasso lujjati, yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi lujjati;
cnd19:36.12: mano lujjati, dhamma lujjanti, manovinnanam lujjati, manosamphasso lujjati; yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi lujjati.
cnd19:36.13: Lujjatiti kho, bhikkhu, tasma lokoti vuccati”.
cnd19:37.1: Sunnato lokam avekkhassuti dvihi karanehi sunnato lokam avekkhati—
cnd19:37.4: Rupe vaso na labbhati, vedanaya vaso na labbhati, sannaya vaso na labbhati, sankharesu vaso na labbhati, vinnane vaso na labbhati.
cnd19:37.7: Rupanca hidam, bhikkhave, atta abhavissa, nayidam rupam abadhaya samvatteyya, labbhetha ca rupe—
cnd19:37.8: ‘evam me rupam hotu, evam me rupam ma ahosi’ti.
cnd19:37.9: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, rupam anatta, tasma rupam abadhaya samvattati na ca labbhati rupe—
cnd19:37.10: ‘evam me rupam hotu, evam me rupam ma ahosi’ti.
cnd19:38.2: Vedana ca hidam, bhikkhave, atta abhavissa, nayidam vedana abadhaya samvatteyya, labbhetha ca vedanaya—
cnd19:38.3: ‘evam me vedana hotu, evam me vedana ma ahosi’ti.
cnd19:38.4: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, vedana anatta, tasma vedana abadhaya samvattati, na ca labbhati vedanaya—
cnd19:38.5: ‘evam me vedana hotu, evam me vedana ma ahosi’ti.
cnd19:39.2: Sanna ca hidam, bhikkhave, atta abhavissa, nayidam sanna abadhaya samvatteyya, labbhetha ca sannaya—
cnd19:39.3: ‘evam me sanna hotu, evam me sanna ma ahosi’ti.
cnd19:39.4: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, sanna anatta, tasma sanna abadhaya samvattati, na ca labbhati sannaya—
cnd19:39.5: ‘evam me sanna hotu, evam me sanna ma ahosi’ti.
cnd19:40.2: Sankhara ca hidam, bhikkhave, atta abhavissamsu, nayidam sankhara abadhaya samvatteyyum, labbhetha ca sankharesu—
cnd19:40.3: ‘evam me sankhara hontu, evam me sankhara ma ahesun’ti.
cnd19:40.4: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, sankhara anatta, tasma sankhara abadhaya samvattanti, na ca labbhati sankharesu—
cnd19:40.5: ‘evam me sankhara hontu, evam me sankhara ma ahesun’ti.
cnd19:41.2: Vinnananca hidam, bhikkhave, atta abhavissa, nayidam vinnanam abadhaya samvatteyya, labbhetha ca vinnane—
cnd19:41.3: ‘evam me vinnanam hotu, evam me vinnanam ma ahosi’ti.
cnd19:41.4: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, vinnanam anatta, tasma vinnanam abadhaya samvattati, na ca labbhati vinnane—
cnd19:41.5: ‘evam me vinnanam hotu, evam me vinnanam ma ahosi’”ti.
cnd19:42.3: Puranamidam, bhikkhave, kammam abhisankhatam abhisancetayitam vedaniyam datthabbam.
cnd19:42.4: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako paticcasamuppadamyeva sadhukam yoniso manasi karoti—
cnd19:42.5: ‘iti imasmim sati idam hoti, imassuppada idam uppajjati;
cnd19:42.6: imasmim asati idam na hoti, imassa nirodha idam nirujjhati, yadidam—
cnd19:42.7: avijjapaccaya sankhara, sankharapaccaya vinnanam, vinnanapaccaya namarupam, namarupapaccaya salayatanam, salayatanapaccaya phasso, phassapaccaya vedana, vedanapaccaya tanha, tanhapaccaya upadanam, upadanapaccaya bhavo, bhavapaccaya jati, jatipaccaya jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa sambhavanti—
cnd19:43.1: Avijjaya tveva asesaviraganirodha sankharanirodho, sankharanirodha vinnananirodho …pe…
cnd19:43.2: jatinirodha jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa nirujjhanti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti”ti.
cnd19:44.2: Rupe saro na labbhati, vedanaya saro na labbhati, sannaya saro na labbhati, sankharesu saro na labbhati, vinnane saro na labbhati;
cnd19:44.3: rupam assaram nissaram sarapagatam niccasarasarena va sukhasarasarena va attasarasarena va niccena va dhuvena va sassatena va aviparinamadhammena va.
cnd19:44.7: vinnanam assaram nissaram sarapagatam niccasarasarena va sukhasarasarena va attasarasarena va niccena va dhuvena va sassatena va aviparinamadhammena va.
cnd19:45.1: Yatha nalo assaro nissaro sarapagato, yatha ca erando …pe…
cnd19:45.2: yatha ca udumbaro assaro nissaro sarapagato, yatha ca setakaccho assaro nissaro sarapagato, yatha ca palibhaddako assaro nissaro sarapagato, yatha ca phenapindo assaro nissaro sarapagato, yatha ca udakapubbulam assaram nissaram sarapagatam, yatha ca marici assara nissara sarapagata, yatha kadalikkhandho assaro nissaro sarapagato, yatha maya assara nissara sarapagata—
cnd19:45.3: evameva rupam assaram nissaram sarapagatam niccasarasarena va sukhasarasarena va attasarasarena va niccena va dhuvena va sassatena va aviparinamadhammena va.
cnd19:45.7: vinnanam assaram nissaram sarapagatam niccasarasarena va sukhasarasarena va attasarasarena va niccena va dhuvena va sassatena va aviparinamadhammena va.
cnd19:45.9: Imehi dvihi karanehi sunnato lokam avekkhati.
cnd19:46.1: Api ca chahakarehi sunnato lokam avekkhati.
cnd19:46.2: Cakkhu sunnam attena va attaniyena va niccena va dhuvena va sassatena va aviparinamadhammena va,
cnd19:46.7: mano sunno attena va attaniyena va niccena va dhuvena va sassatena va aviparinamadhammena va.
cnd19:46.13: dhamma sunna attena va attaniyena va niccena va dhuvena va sassatena va aviparinamadhammena va.
cnd19:46.27: dhammavicaro sunno attena va attaniyena va niccena va dhuvena va sassatena va aviparinamadhammena va.
cnd19:47.1: Api ca dasahakarehi sunnato lokam avekkhati.
cnd19:47.2: Rupam rittato tucchato sunnato anattato asarakato vadhakato vibhavato aghamulato sasavato sankhatato;
cnd19:47.11: samsaravattam rittato tucchato sunnato anattato asarakato vadhakato vibhavato aghamulato sasavato sankhatato.
cnd19:48.1: Api ca dvadasahakarehi sunnato lokam avekkhati.
cnd19:48.2: Rupam na satto na jivo na naro na manavo na itthi na puriso na atta na attaniyam naham na mama na koci na kassaci;
cnd19:48.6: vinnanam na satto na jivo na naro na manavo na itthi na puriso na atta na attaniyam naham na mama na koci na kassaci.
cnd19:49.3: Tam vo pahinam digharattam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
cnd19:49.5: Rupam, bhikkhave, na tumhakam, tam pajahatha.
cnd19:49.6: Tam vo pahinam digharattam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
cnd19:49.7: Vedana, bhikkhave, na tumhakam, tam pajahatha.
cnd19:49.8: Sa vo pahina digharattam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
cnd19:49.9: Sanna, bhikkhave, na tumhakam, tam pajahatha.
cnd19:49.10: Sa vo pahina digharattam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
cnd19:49.11: Sankhara, bhikkhave, na tumhakam, te pajahatha.
cnd19:49.12: Te vo pahina digharattam hitaya sukhaya bhavissanti.
cnd19:49.13: Vinnanam, bhikkhave, na tumhakam, tam pajahatha.
cnd19:49.14: Tam vo pahinam digharattam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
cnd19:49.15: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yam imasmim jetavane tinakatthasakhapalasam tam jano hareyya va daheyya va yathapaccayam va kareyya.
cnd19:49.17: ‘amhe jano harati va dahati va yathapaccayam va karoti’”ti?
cnd19:49.20: “Na hi no etam, bhante, atta va attaniyam” vati.
cnd19:49.21: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yam na tumhakam tam pajahatha;
cnd19:49.22: tam vo pahinam digharattam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
cnd19:49.24: Rupam, bhikkhave, na tumhakam, tam pajahatha.
cnd19:49.25: Tam vo pahinam digharattam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
cnd19:49.29: vinnanam, bhikkhave, na tumhakam, tam pajahatha.
cnd19:49.30: Tam vo pahinam digharattam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati”ti.
cnd19:50.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, sunno lokoti vuccati”ti?
cnd19:50.4: “Yasma ca kho, ananda, sunnam attena va attaniyena va, tasma sunno lokoti vuccati.
cnd19:50.5: Kincananda, sunnam attena va attaniyena va?
cnd19:50.6: Cakkhu kho, ananda, sunnam attena va attaniyena va.
cnd19:50.10: yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi sunnam attena va attaniyena va.
cnd19:50.23: yampidam sunnam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi sunnam attena va attaniyena va.
cnd19:50.24: Yasma ca kho, ananda, sunnam attena va attaniyena va, tasma sunno lokoti vuccati”ti.
cnd19:54.2: “evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rupam samannesati yavata rupassa gati,
cnd19:54.7: Tassa rupam samannesato yavata rupassa gati,
cnd19:54.11: vinnanam samannesato yavata vinnanassa gati, yampissa tam hoti ahanti va mamanti va asmiti va, tampi tassa na hoti”ti.
cnd19:55.1: Sunnato lokam avekkhassuti sunnato lokam avekkhassu paccavekkhassu dakkhassu tulehi tirehi vibhavehi vibhutam karohiti—
cnd19:57.2: Idha assutava puthujjano ariyanam adassavi ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinito sappurisanam adassavi sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinito rupam attato samanupassati rupavantam va attanam attani va rupam rupasmim va attanam,
cnd19:57.6: vinnanam attato samanupassati vinnanavantam va attanam attani va vinnanam vinnanasmim va attanam.
cnd19:57.7: Ya evarupa ditthi ditthigatam ditthigahanam ditthikantaro ditthivisukayikam ditthivipphanditam ditthisamyojanam gaho patiggaho abhiniveso paramaso kummaggo micchapatho micchattam titthayatanam vipariyesaggaho viparitaggaho vipallasaggaho micchagaho ayathavakasmim yathavakanti gaho yavata dvasatthi ditthigatani, ayam attanuditthi.
cnd19:57.8: Attanuditthim uhaccati attanuditthim uhacca samuhacca uddharitva samuddharitva uppatayitva samuppatayitva pajahitva vinodetva byantikaritva anabhavam gametvati—
cnd19:58.1: Evam maccutaro siyati evam maccupi tareyyasi, jarapi tareyyasi, maranampi tareyyasi uttareyyasi patareyyasi samatikkameyyasi vitivatteyyasiti—
cnd19:59.1: Evam lokam avekkhantanti evam lokam avekkhantam paccavekkhantam tulayantam tirayantam vibhavayantam vibhutam karontanti—
cnd19:60.1: Maccuraja na passatiti maccupi maccuraja, maropi maccuraja, maranampi maccuraja.
cnd19:60.2: Na passatiti maccuraja na passati na dakkhati nadhigacchati na vindati na patilabhati.
cnd19:60.4: “seyyathapi, bhikkhave, aranniko migo aranne pavane caramano vissattho gacchati vissattho titthati vissattho nisidati vissattho seyyam kappeti.
cnd19:60.7: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
cnd19:60.8: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu andhamakasi maram, apadam vadhitva maracakkhum adassanam gato papimato’.
cnd19:61.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam …pe…
cnd19:61.4: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu andhamakasi maram, apadam vadhitva maracakkhum adassanam gato papimato’.
cnd19:62.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama, patighasannanam atthangama, nanattasannanam amanasikara, ananto akasoti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
cnd19:62.2: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu andhamakasi maram, apadam vadhitva maracakkhum adassanam gato papimato’.
cnd19:63.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma anantam vinnananti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati …pe….
cnd19:64.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma natthi kinciti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati …pe….
cnd19:65.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati …pe….
cnd19:66.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati;
cnd19:66.2: pannaya cassa disva asava parikkhina honti.
cnd19:66.3: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu andhamakasi maram, apadam vadhitva maracakkhum adassanam gato papimato, tinno loke visattikan’ti.
cnd19:66.4: So vissattho gacchati vissattho titthati vissattho nisidati vissattho seyyam kappeti.
